name: antsLandmarkBasedTransformInitializer
author: ANTs Developers
description: This tool initializes a transform between two images based on corresponding landmarks.

inputs.name: Dimension
inputs.description: The dimensionality of the registration problem (e.g., 2 for 2D, 3 for 3D).

inputs.name: Fixed Image
inputs.description: The fixed image in the registration process.

inputs.name: Moving Image
inputs.description: The moving image in the registration process.

inputs.name: Transform Type
inputs.description: The type of transform to initialize. Options are 'rigid', 'affine', or 'bspline'.

inputs.name: Output Transform
inputs.description: The output transform file that will be created.

inputs.name: Mesh Size
inputs.description: The mesh size for the B-spline transform, specified as 'meshSize[0]xmeshSize[1]x...'. Default is '1x1x1'.

inputs.name: Number of Levels
inputs.description: Number of levels for multi-resolution fitting. Default is 4.

inputs.name: Order
inputs.description: The polynomial order of the B-spline transform. Default is 3.

inputs.name: Enforce Stationary Boundaries
inputs.description: Enforces stationary boundaries for the B-spline transform. Default is 1 (true).

inputs.name: Landmark Weights
inputs.description: File containing landmark weights. Each row is either 'label,labelWeight' or 'labelWeight'.

output-files.name: Output Transform
output-files.description: The output file containing the initialized transform.
